title: Normal Watermark Preset
description: A simple yet striking preset with bright, glowing white text against a pure black background. The text quickly fades in and out, creating a clean, professional, and memorable brand flash.

title: Dual Layer Watermark Preset
description: A watermark animation featuring white text on black. The key element is the bold cursor, which appears and then jumps to the left of the text, giving a dynamic, responsive feel to the reveal before the logo disappears.

title: Glitch Watermark Preset
description: A high-energy, futuristic transition preset. It features a bright white cursor that types the first text, which then undergoes a glitch-style digital breakdown and is replaced by a second text (AM) before the scene quickly clears to a black screen with only the blinking cursor.

title: Made By Watermark Preset
description: A modern, high-contrast watermark where the name 'VORAKS' is typed. A second, smaller line of text ('MADE BY') is then layered above it as the cursor shifts. The full credit text then glitches and dissolves, leaving a clean black screen.

title: Logo Glitch Watermark Preset
description: A sharp, high-contrast intro where the word 'VORAKS' is typed out by a bright cursor, then immediately explodes with a digital glitch effect. The text is abruptly replaced by a vivid red spider icon before the entire animation fades away.

title: Crimson Slash Watermark Preset
description: An attention-grabbing, minimalist watermark that uses a bold red vertical line (or slash) to quickly wipe and reveal the 'VORAKS' name. Its sharp, energetic movement makes it ideal for a quick brand stamp.

title: Aero Glow Watermark Preset
description: An enchanting, minimalist reveal where a luminous, stylized airplane crosses the screen, leaving the 'VORAKS' name in its glowing wake. The effect has a soft, dreamlike quality with a subtle purple-pink palette.

title: Crosshair Reveal Watermark Preset
description: A clean, high-impact animated watermark that uses white geometric lines and brackets to frame and reveal the 'MADE BY VORAKS' text. The minimalist, high-tech aesthetic gives the feel of a heads-up display (HUD) or a cinematic target lock—perfect for gaming, tech, or production-focused content.

title: Neon Swipe Watermark Preset
description: A bold, modern animated watermark that uses a vibrant, glowing purple vertical bar to wipe across the screen, revealing the 'MADE BY VORAKS' text. The clean lines and bright neon color give it a sleek, energetic, and high-tech feel—perfect for dark-themed edits.
